page.title: 14RESULTS OF THE PIT CLOSURE
page.content: {Q. What effect has the closing of the {pit had on the people in Cardowan {village ? A. The village's population has gone down because some of the workers have transferred to other areas. Local shops have found that business has fallen off due to the unemployment in the area. {Q. Did you have a choice whether or {not to accept redundancy or to move to {another pit ? A. I could have moved to Frances Colliery in Fife, but I did not want to leave this area as all my family live nearby. So I accepted redundancy. {Q. Have you managed to find another {job ? A. No, I have been unemployed since I left the Colliery.
